text: Bina sandeha muslima purusa ra muslima striharu, imanavala purusa ra imanavali striharu, nisthapurvaka, ajnapalana garne purusa ra nisthavana striharu, ra satyavadi purusaharu ra satyavadi striharu, dhairyavan purusaharu ra dhairya garne striharu, vinamrata dekha'une purusaharu ra vinamrata dekha'une striharu, sadka (dana) dine purusa, ra dana dine striharu, roja (vrata) basne purusa ra roja basne striharu, aphna guptangaharuko raksa garne purusa ra raksa garne striharu ra allahala'i dherai smarana garne purusa ra smarana garne striharu yiniharuka nimti allahale ksama ra thulo pratiphala tayara gareko cha
